title: St Helens vs Salford LIVE score: Super League Grand Final TV channel, live stream details and team news
text:
It's Grand Final day!

St Helens and Salford will do battle for Super League glory at Old Trafford as both sides look to cap fine seasons with silverware.

Saints will be desperate to atone for their Challenge Cup final defeat by Warrington at Wembley earlier this term having romped to the league leaders shield by a record point margin.

Salford, meanwhile, have upset all the odds to reach the Theatre of Dreams, hammering Wigan on their own turf last week to seal their place.

Can the Red Devils produce a seismic shock tonight?

Keep it here for all the action as it happens.

St Helens: Coote; Makinson, Naiqama, Percival, Grace; Lomax, Fages; Walmsley, Roby, Thompson; Taia, Peyroux; Knowles. Subs: McCarthy-Scarsbrook, Amor, Ashworth, Smith

Salford: Evalds; Sio, Welham, Bibby, Inu; Lolohea, Hastings; Mossop, Tomkins, Dudson; Jones, Griffin; McCarthy. Subs: Lussick, Flanaga, Walker, Burke

The match will be broadcast live exclusively live on Sky Sports and can be streamed via the SkyGo app.
description: Salford are looking to pull off a seismic shock at Old Trafford against big favourites St Helens
